[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575628382219{margin-top: -80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id=”sidebar-5b6cfa681b024″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section el_id=”overview” css=”.vc_custom_1575628385570{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row gap=”35″][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”YOUR TRUSTED SOURCE IN IT SERVICES & SUPPORT” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

NanoSoft is a privately owned IT Support and IT Services business formed in 1988. Today we’re proud to boast a strong team of IT engineers who thrive on rolling up their sleeves and solving your IT problems and meeting your business needs.

We are on a mission to exceed your expectations and form a long-term, mutually beneficial relationship with you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-xs-6″]

0+

Experts across a range of specializations
[vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-xs-6″]

0

So far we have offices across 30 countries
[vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-xs-6″]

$0M

$0 to $15M in revenue in under 3 years
[vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
  • OUR MISSION

    Building on our technologies and competencies creating value for our customers. We’ll achieve this by focusing on the intersection of our client’s emerging needs and the acceleration of business and technological change.

  • OUR VALUES

    Our values are the guiding principles upon which NanoSoft was founded and how we strive to conduct our business on a daily basis. Values establish our view of the world as we shape the future. They determine how we treat each other.

  • OUR APPROACH & CULTURE

    Our drive for exceptional service delivery is built on the belief that we are nothing if you are not satisfied with us. Our passion for helping you achieve your goals, no matter what, is what truly differentiates us from our competitors.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1575628404473{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_id=”history”][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our History” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”DEVELOPMENT HISTORY OF NANOSOFT SOLUTIONS” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ff0055″][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1575628412677{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”1988 – 1990″ font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]NanoSoft begins life as the networking division of ThemeForest. ThemeForest is a software company that was formed in November 1988 following a management buyout of LineThemes.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1534133353803{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”2000 – 2009″ font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]NanoSoft launches as an independent business. NanoSoft moves into our New York offices. Those offices became home for the next 20 years as the business continued to grow from strength to strength.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1534133362720{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”2010 – 2017″ font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]NanoSoft successfully partners with Envato, a growing provider of local Australia IT Support and IT Services to both local and overseas businesses.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1534133373185{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”2018 – Present” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]The service team at NanoSoft made it through to the final of the Service Desk Industry (SDI) Best Small Managed Service Desk Provider (MSP) awards. We are incredibly proud of the external recognition for our team, who have completed extensive training and have worked incredibly hard over an extended period to ensure we consistently meet the needs of our customers.ers with CComm IT Solutions, a UK provider of outsourced IT Services.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section parallax=”content-moving” css=”.vc_custom_1575628421410{background: #0a2044 url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft-3/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/rawpixel-com-567026-unsplash1.jpg?id=143) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”values”][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575628427362{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-color: rgba(35,24,52,0.75) !important;*background-color: rgb(35,24,52) !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”our values” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:3rem|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none” el_class=”delay-1 custom-hd”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text el_class=”aligncenter white-color”]

COMMITMENT INNOVATION REPUTATION EXCELLENCE

Now Hiring: Are you a driven and motivated 1st Line IT Support Engineer?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575628451706{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_id=”why”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why choose us” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”6 REASONS TO PARTNER WITH US” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ff0055″][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

  • Quick response

    We can log in to your PC or server remotely and resolve many issues immediately without the wait for a technician to travel to your location.

  • Experienced

    In more than 30 years of IT outsourcing, we have gained experience in a wide spectrum of technologies, industries, and application types.

  • No geek speak

    You deserve to have your questions answered in plain English. Our technicians will clearly explain what is happening so you understand.

  • Business savvy

    We design, evaluate and justify technology solutions from a thorough understanding of the business benefit for your company.

  • One Stop Shop

    We handle all aspects of your IT infrastructure including hardware, software management and any other related technology needs.

  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

    We want you to be completely satisfied with our services. We will do whatever it takes to make you happy. No hassles, no problems.

[vc_column_text]

Stop wasting time and money on technology. Contact Us Now

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575628458538{padding-top: 100px !important;}” el_id=”blog”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”FORM OUR BLOG” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”IDEAS THAT DRIVE TOMORROW’S INNOVATION” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Explore the NanoSoft IT Blog for valuable insights and thought leadership on industry best practices in managed IT services and enterprise IT trends.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
